---
title: THE KTL GROUP
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: the_ktl_group
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $277.1K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with THE KTL GROUP. The average
  contract duration was 1 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $210.4K.
  The longest contract was 3.36 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $2.3M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '277.1K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '35'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '17'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '49%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '102%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.94'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '2.1M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '210.4K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '3.36'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '2.3M'
---
